Title: songtagger
HomeWiki:
Project Description

songtagger is just an another application to set the mp3 tags but it does in a semi-automatic manner.
It queries the information from the MusicBrainz DB and try to find the correct coverart for the selected album.

 

As you can see the UI is very minimal so it's very easy to use.

Key Features

  • fetches all music data from MusicBrainz DB
  • sets tags (ID3v1 and ID3v2) of the selected mp3 files with the correct artist name, album name, album release year, genre of artist and song title
  • creates a new folder structure based on fixed mp3 ID3 Tags
  • downloads the coverart which provieded by Cover-Archive
  • supports to get covertart from Last.FM as well (optional)
  • can handle custom coverarts directly from the web browser
